name: .MASTER File Extension
summary: Learn about .MASTER files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a MASTER file in Microsoft Visual Studio (Windows). To do so, open a Visual Studio project and select Project â†’ Add Existing Item. Then, navigate to and open your MASTER file. This will add the MASTER file to your Visual Studio project.
